ovdesc.p: Live file used to record the FATCA status information with effective dates for each FATCA customer accounts.
It will be updated during authorization of FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record created. And the information will be deleted if the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record is reversed

desc.p: The customer id of the client for whom the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO is created.
The date on which the the FATCA.STATUS is updated.
Forms part of a multi value set with FATCA.STATUS and FCSI.CURR.NO
This will hold the FATCA.STATUS updated in the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record. If this has not been specified in the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record then this field will be blank.
The CURR.NO value of the FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO record in which the status was updated.
